name: Tejash Player
short_description:
Because there are a million different types of people who listen to music on their computers, a wide variety of audio players had to be developed. Although you can easily get lost in the multitude of choices, whenever you want a player that is simple, convenient and efficient Tejash Player is the way to go.

Tejash Player is a user friendly audio player that will help you to conveniently listen to all the songs that you like. This awesome tool will make your music listening experience a lot more pleasant.Tejash Player supports almost every type of audio format, thus being able to easily play all the music files that you have. Moreover, this handy tool is also able to record your voice and save the file using the popular .WAV format.With Tejash Player you will be able to create your own playlists and save them so that you won't have to manually select all the songs that you want to hear each time you run the application. Furthermore, you can also listen to online radio stations.
summary: Free Audio Media player and Radio Player. Lots of things to have fun
